flowchart TD
    A[Generative AI Capability Improvement] --> B[Synthetic Media Quality Increases]
    B --> C{Detection Keeps Pace?}
    C -->|Yes| D[Temporary Equilibrium]
    D --> A
    C -->|No| E[Human Detection Falls to Chance]
    E --> F[Technical Detection Fails]
    F --> G[Authentication Crisis Threshold Crossed]
    G --> H[Direct Deception Becomes Viable]
    G --> I[Liar's Dividend Becomes Universal]
    H --> J[Evidentiary Collapse]
    I --> J
    J --> K[Legal System Adaptation Required]
    J --> L[Journalism Transformation]
    J --> M[Social Trust Erosion]

    N[Content Provenance Adoption] --> O{Achieves Critical Mass?}
    O -->|Yes| P[Two-Tier Media System Emerges]
    O -->|No| Q[Crisis Unmitigated]
    P --> R[Partial Trust Restoration]
    Q --> J
